My Las Vegas Presentations

05 August 2010

The slides of my presentations at DefCon 18 and Security B Sides Las Vegas are available for download.

DefCon 18 – Seccubus – PPTX (61MB) - PDF (4MB)

BSidesLV – The road to hell - PPTX (17MB) – PDF (4MB)

The recordings of the LiveStream of BSides LV are available for Track 1, Track 2 and some of the lightning talks. My talk is here at about the 2:15 mark.

EuroTrash Security Podcast interview Seccubus version 1.5 – The DefCon edition
